title: [FEA]  Support comparison between queries within a single app
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I wish the Profiling Tool would make it possible to compare metrics between the queries of a single app

**Describe the solution you'd like**
It's common  for the user to experiment with GPU vs CPU by simply toggling the conf `spark.rapids.sql.enabled` within a single REPL/notebook SparkSession. 

Also most of spark-rapids tests are written with a flabor of assert_cpu_and_gpu_eqauls  executing the same query twice.

It would be great to be able to report the metric diffs between queries identified by ID's or the job description as in the [test case](https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/pull/2520#issuecomment-849245551).

For tests the the A/B sides of the diff can be identified automatically 

| jobId | description |
| ------ | --------------- |
| 31 | src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)[GPU]collect at /home/gshegalov/gits/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/integration_tests/src/main/python/asserts.py:184 |
| 30 | src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)[GPU]collect at /home/gshegalov/gits/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/integration_tests/src/main/python/asserts.py:184 |
| 29 | src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)[CPU]collect at /home/gshegalov/gits/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/integration_tests/src/main/python/asserts.py:184 |
| 28 | src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)[CPU]collect at /home/gshegalov/gits/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/integration_tests/src/main/python/asserts.py:184 |

by using 
- the prefix of the job description `src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)` as the "experiment id" 
- the prefix of jobs `src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)[CPU]` to group and aggregate metrics on the CPU query
- the prefix `src/main/python/sort_test.py::test_large_orderby_nested_ridealong[Array(Byte)] (call)[GPU]` to group and aggregate metrics for the GPU counterpart query.


  

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
One can redo the experiment and  restart the Spark session to produce subsequent event logs for comparison, but it may be difficult.

**Additional context**
N/A
